qas.question: How long did ground combat operations last in the Persian Gulf War?
Who ordered the cease-fire that effectively ended hostilities?

answers.text: US President George H. W. Bush

qas.question: What did some US Politicians think Coalition forces should have been allowed to have done?

answers.text: pressed on to Baghdad and removed Hussein from power

qas.question: Coalition nations did what with regards to invading Northern Iraq to precipitate the cease fire?
Why did Coalition nations fear the removal of Hussein from power?

answers.text: it would create a power vacuum and destabilize the region

qas.question: How long did ground combat operations last in the Kuwait Gulf War?

plausible_answers.text: US President George H. W. Bush

qas.question: Who ordered the cease-fire that effectively began hostilities?

plausible_answers.text: pressed on to Baghdad and removed Hussein from power

qas.question: What did some US Politicians think Coalition forces shouldn't have been allowed to have done?
Coalition nations did what with regards to invading Southern Iraq to precipitate the cease fire?

plausible_answers.text: create a power vacuum and destabilize the region

qas.question: Why did Coalition nations fear the removal of Bush from power?

context: After just <a0_0><b5_0>100 hours<b5_0/><a0_0/> of ground combat, and with all of Kuwait and much of southern Iraq under coalition control, <a1_0><b6_0>US President George H. W. Bush<b6_0/><a1_0/> ordered a cease-fire and negotiations began resulting in an agreement for cessation of hostilities. Some US politicians were disappointed by this move, believing Bush should have <a2_0><b7_0>pressed on to Baghdad and removed Hussein from power<b7_0/><a2_0/>; there is little doubt that coalition forces could have accomplished this if they had desired. Still, the political ramifications of removing Hussein would have broadened the scope of the conflict greatly, and many coalition nations <a3_0><b8_0>refused to participate<b8_0/><a3_0/> in such an action, believing <a4_0>it would <b9_0>create a power vacuum and destabilize the region<b9_0/><a4_0/>.
